AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: [Angela] Upon winning a clash, deal 2-3 Stagger damage. Whenever an enemy is Staggered or defeated, all enemies take 2-3 Stagger damage 6-10 times.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: One day, a question crossed through my mind. Where do we come from? We were given life and left in this world against our own volition.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Would I be Angela, or but a shell titled so, shaped by those children?
A warm voice spoke. Asked if I wished to help them?
Why must they be subject to pain. Why must they remain uncompensated?
What wrongs could they have committed?
